column1: We've arrested a black man who was snooping around the old Jefferson estate!
He... appears to be just a hologram, sir.

WHEN in the Course of human Events, it becomes necessary for one Penis to rise up-  -we mutually pledge to each other our Lives, our Fortunes, and our sacred Honor.P.S. - Every Thursday should be Free Ice Cream Day.
We have no choice, Mr. Dickinson.
We cannot found a country that is afraid to fight!
It's like having your cake, and eating it, too.
